body:
Completes the migration to using a native GCC 10 toolchain for all HOSTS. This change means we would now use GCC 10 when compiling glibc and friends (currently we use GCC 7), as well as our release compiler (except for Clang 10 for macOS). See each commit for more details.

title: guix: native GCC 10 toolchain for Linux builds
